meanings.definition: A measuring stick one meter long.
meanings.sent1: I used a meterstick to measure the length of the table.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter grabbed a meterstick to check the dimensions of the door.
meanings.sent3: The meterstick decided to start a band with the tape measure and ruler.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as straight and precise as a meterstick.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the meterstick made it easy to spot in the toolbox.
